AppUpdate.VersionNotes: - Audio recording device can be passed through to an audio playback device (#18) - Hotkeys can be assigned to sounds - Multiple sounds or a whole folder can be added at once - Select sounds with Control- or Shift-Click to update or play multiple at once - Sounds can be configured to stop all other sounds when played - Sound names are more readable at different sizes (#17) - Tabs with currently playing sounds will now be clearly indicated - Sounds can trigger other sounds, allowing chaining - The default grid layout for new pages can be configured - General bug fixes and improvements
